amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that companies bidding on new leases first renegotiate any royalty-free leases they may already own.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-74 to require that new 5-year leasing plans require that companies bidding on new leases first renegotiate any royalty-free leases they own; thus raising more than $2 billion over 10 years.
